ComicInfo.Summary:
"The Hitchhiker"
When a lonely salesman picks up a young woman stranded on the side of the road, she turns out to be sweet, sexy, and grateful for the ride. He can't believe his luck... until the subject of sex comes up and suddenly his hitchhiker fantasy takes a deadly turn.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Richard Ortiz & Ylenia di Napoli | 1 | B | Cover B | Marat Mychaels & Ross Campbell | 3 | C | Cover C | Eric J & Alessia Nocera | 4 | D | London Super Comic Con Exclusive Cover, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | 2 | E | London Super Comic Con Exclusive Cover, Limited to 100 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
